longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents issued to
  nationals of Cook Isl. must be valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- For additional exemptions and requirements see passport
  exemptions mentioned for the USA. 

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 45 days for those
traveling under the Guam-Northern Mariana Isl. Visa Waiver
program as tourists or on business (SEE NOTE 35108). 
    NOTE 35108: Provided passenger:  
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for nationals
of Cook Isl. traveling as tourists, on business or in transit
(SEE NOTE 49497) (SEE NOTE 49498) (SEE NOTE 49499) (SEE NOTE
49500) (SEE NOTE 60208). 
    NOTE 49497: Passengers must obtain an ESTA authorization
   (via https://esta.cbp.dhs.gov/) prior to boarding. 
    NOTE 49498: Passport issued on or after October 26, 2006
   must be biometric (i.e. e-Passport, containing an
   integrated chip).
    NOTE 49499: Passport issued on or after October 26, 2005,
   but prior to October 26, 2006 must:
   - be machine-readable and contain a digital photograph; or
   - be biometric (i.e. e-Passport, containing an integrated
   chip).
    NOTE 49500: Passport issued prior to October 26, 2005 must
   be machine-readable.
    NOTE 60208: Visitors must hold a return/onward ticket.
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for holders
of a US entry visa which is valid at least 6 months from entry
into the Northern Mariana Isl. and allows re-entry into the
USA. 
Minors:
- Minors travelling accompanied by one parent or by a person
  other than parent/legal guardian . 
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold sufficient funds (min. of USD
  100.- per day or proof of valid credit card) to cover their
  stay and documents required for their next destination. (SEE
  NOTE 46949) 
    NOTE 46949: Exempt are holders of a valid US visa.
- Airlines are required to charge an additional  Immigration
  Inspection  fee of USD 7,- to travelers visiting the
  Northern Mariana Isl.. Fee will be collected either upon
  ticket issuance or upon embarkation. 



 Northern Mariana Isl
